entry.title: $2200 // Beautiful 1BR in Cobble Hill
entry.content:
Available March 15 (some flexibility): Beautifully renovated and remodeled 1BR apartment right in the heart of Cobble Hill.

Features: great natural light, hardwood floors, exposed brick, renovated kitchen with state-of-the-art LG appliances, granite countertop, dishwasher, oven and microwave; renovated bathroom. Laundry is also in building.

There are TWO furnished lawn courtyards - with lovely gazebos - for barbecues, parties, or soaking up sun. Building manager AND superintendent live on-site and are very friendly, helpful, and accessible. There is also an office open 8am-5pm which comes in VERY handy for Amazon Prime, Fresh Direct, Sunbasket, UPS, and FedEx deliveries :-) Building is quiet and filled with down-to-earth young singles/new parents and long-time residents.

Trader Joe's is a 10-minute walk away; close to Bergen F and Borough Hall 2/3/4/5 trains. Cobble Hill/Court St. Cinemas, book stores, great dry-cleaning and amazing tailors only a few blocks away along Court Street. Right next to Red Hook, Carroll Gardens, Brooklyn Heights and two stops from DUMBO.

AND - the Brooklyn Heights Promenade is five minutes away! Smorgasburg is there, along with brand new jogging and biking paths, parks, soccer fields, and basketball courts. Boasts gorgeous views of lower Manhattan and NYC's harbor.

ABSOLUTELY NO pets and NO SMOKING inside the apartment.

Minimum one-year lease with option for second year---rent WILL NOT INCREASE for second year.

Contact me here for a walk-through.

NOTE: apartment will be UNFURNISHED (currently tenant-occupied).
